name: Corona - The Game
description:
Storyline:

You are Dr. Vir Uskill Er, an excellent doctor who wants to find the cure for the coronavirus. Finish 3 Levels by fighting viruses and collecting medicines, vaccines, and 1 patient to get your cure approved! 

Two Modes:

•Easy: Where you don’t lose anything if a virus touches you

•HARDCORE: Where you lose EVERYTHING if a virus touches you

Controls/Instructions:

  •WASD or arrow keys to move

  •Return to attack

  •You MUST be moving while you attack
